1.content:
It was a normal day in the Sinnoh region.Ash,Dawn and Brock were resting peacfully,untill an evil pokemon trainer came to them(we'll call him Lesaly...what,can't a guy be called Lesaly without people laughing at him?!).

Lesaly:Darkrai,come on out!
Lesaly threw a pokeball and after a flash of light,Darkrai appered.
Lesaly:Darkrai,Dark Void!
With that,Darkrai shot a dark ball at Ash and engulfed him.

Ash's dream became a nightmare.

Lucus:HOLD IT RIGHT THERE LESALY!
Lesaly:DAMN,IT'S YOU LUCUS!
Lucus:PREPARE FOR BATTLE!DIALGIA,PALKIA,STANDBY!
Dialga and Palkia came forth.

Lucus:Palkia,enter the dream of the boy who got hit by Dark Void.
Palkia glew purple and dissapered into ashes dream...
want to stick with the battle or go to the dream fight?

note:I would like to give a special thanks to Charliemew11,(s)he was the 1st aurthor to contribute 20 chapters to 1 of my stories.

1111.title: Grows

11111.content:
Suddenly Dawn stops at 200 feet.
"Are you ok....?" Ash said, Scared to death.
"I am fine Ash." Dawn said, but with a evil smile.
"Good, then we can go ahead and explore this place." Ash said.

"I was thinking that you could give me a foot message." Dawn said.
"Er.......But what if we get in troub-" Ash was interrupted by Dawn's big foot coming down. "On second thought, I will start doing that." Ash finished his sentence.
"Good, because if you don't, I will crush you." Dawn said.

She pulled off her shoes and socks and Put both of her feet in front of Ash, who smelled the horrid odor of her feet.
11111.title: Dawn is OK!!!! (I Think.....)

111112.content: Ash thinks for a second on what to do next, and then gets an idea. "Hey Dawn, mabye I should start with your heels first so that they won't hurt when you crush me, or are you to chicken to battle me. If I win, then I get out of here! If you win, you can crush me! Deal?
111112.title: A lethal sounding Challenge

choices: Dawn becomes a giantess in the real world
1111121.content:
"okay" Dawn says happily and stands up to her full high.
"good" ash mutters to himself while looking for a pokeball, but freezes when he sees Dawn's foot hovering over him.
"too slow" she says and brings her booted foot on top of him. Squeezing the remains under her boot, Dawn grins evilly
at the ground, but suddenly looks confused as the spot where ash was begins glow brightly. She goes blind and blacks out!
1111121.title: Dawn accepts

1111122.content:
"Nah." Dawn said.
"What???" Ash said.
"Go ahead Ash, start rubbing." Dawn said.
"Fine...........:" Ash said.

Ash started to rub the heels on her feet, so her stomp couldn't hurt as much. Then he did her soles. Dawn was enjoying the foot rub. Ash, however was not living this down as he finished the soles and started to get the toes done. Dawn started to turn back to normal.

"Ash, you did a good job." Dawn said. "Now, you will be my wittle wlaything." She said it in a voice that would amuse a baby.
"What?!?!?!?!?!?!?" Ash said.
"Hey, I am back to normal, if I wasn't, you would be dead maybe." Dawn said.
"Yeah......Now what....." Ash said.
1111122.title: Dreams never go your way, NEVER!

choices: Dawn has Ash give her a foot rub
Dawn has Ash as her new pokemon
Dawn has Ash as a slave
1113.content:
Dawn tossed a poke'ball to Ash. As soon as he touched it, the ball started flashing red rapidly. Then he could feel the ball get very hot. He had to drop it to avoid burning his hands.
"Hey! That thing's hot!" Ash said. But nothing could prepare the trainer for what happened next. Suddenly the beam shot himself ! Even more surprising was the fact that Ash was now glowing red all over, like a Pokemon would.

"Ash! What's going on?" Dawn said.

"I don't know! Someone help..." Before Ash could finish, his body suddenly faded into the red light as it was drawn into the ball! Dawn gasped at what she had just seen.

"No way! It just trapped him inside! That's impossible! Isn't the beam only supposed to affect Pokemon?" Dawn said. Dawn decided to pick up the Pokeball, desperate to know if her friend was okay.

"Ash, are you all right?" she said.

"Dawn, is that you? Hurry up and get me out of this thing!" Ash's voice said. She couldn't see him, but at least she knew he was okay. She then threw the ball towards the ground. As it hit, the pokeball opened. Dawn gasped once again.

Again she couldn't believe what she had just seen. Ash was there, all right... but he had shrunk! Almost like a few years ago when Sabrina nearly trapped Ash and his friends inside her dollhouse, except not as small this time around. He looked about six inches tall.
"Ash!?!?" Dawn shouted.

Ash immediately could tell why she was so shocked. She were so big compared to his size.

"Uh... yeah. I think I already get the hint, Dawn." Ash said.
"But how? How did this happen?" Dawn asked.

"I really don't know. This is something I've never dealt with before. At least... not in this case." Ash said. "Can't we think of a way we can possibly reverse this effect? I can't stand being smaller than a Diglett! Or Pikachu for that matter." Ash said.

Dawn walked up to the shrunken Ash. For Ash, it was obviously an overwhelming feeling to be seeing someone as pretty as Dawn tower over him. Dawn had become a good friend of Ash in the short time they've been together. He watched as Dawn kneeled down to pick him up.

"You know Ash...I like this size." Dawn said with an evil smirk.
1113.title: Ash Shrinks

"hehehe" Dawn giggles with delight. "I caught an ash" she exclaims happily "now, what to do with my new Pokemon?"

My Palkia is somewhere here and he is looking for you to get you out of this nightmare of a dream." Lucus tells Ash. Ash is puzzled. He doesn't see how this could be a nightmare. There was nothing around them. "No offense, but are you O.K kid? Theres nothing here." Ash says to Lucus with a hint of nervousy in his tone. "Oh, I didn't say something, I ment someone." info.brief_description: Darkrai gives Ash a nightmare that includes Dawn becoming an evil giantess
info.description: An evil pokemon trainer has caught Darkrai:the Nightmare Pokemon.And he is using Darkrai's trademark attack(Dark Void which puts the target to sleep which goes perfectly with Darkrai's nightmare ability)is puting everyone in sinnoh to sleep forever.Only one trainer has the pokemon to stop him,his name Is Lucus(the boy player in Pokemon Diamond and Pearl versions)he has Palkia and Dialgia,the only 2 pokemon able to stop it .But it was to late before he got Ash Katchum.And now Ash must avoid getting killed in his dream because he will get killed for real if he dose...
